summary: SPX Strategy Engine v1 testing completed successfully. Backend API works correctly with proper response format, frontend loads and displays strategy data with working controls.

design_issues.issue: SPX Strategy Engine v1 reasons and risk notes may not be fully visible in UI despite data being received correctly

passed_tests: GET /api/fractal/spx/strategy?horizon=7d&preset=BALANCED returns correct Strategy Engine v1 format
Invalid horizon and preset parameters properly return 400 errors
SPX page /fractal/spx loads successfully with correct title
Strategy Summary component receives and processes SPX data
Strategy horizon controls (7D/14D/30D) are clickable and update data
Chart updates dynamically when controls change
